sourcesContent:
<template>
    <select v-model="selected" class="form-select mt-1 block w-full
    border p-3 rounded mt-10">
        <option value="0">Select Country</option>
        <option v-for="country in countries" :value="country.ID">
            {{country.Country}}
        </option>
    </select>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: 'CountrySelect',
        props:['countries'],
        data() {
            return {
                selected: 0
            }
        }
    }
</script>
